synopsis.text: To cope with the tragic loss of her cherished older sister Peta in an accident, young prodigy Null utilizes her exceptional intellect to construct a robot replica, Peta Robo, embodying her late sister's traits. However, the robot doesn't quite align with Null's expectations, leading to a chaotic yet heartwarming daily life. As Peta Robo tenderly cares for her little sister, Null occasionally finds herself dodging an array of tools and weapons wielded by her robotic sibling. Brace yourself for a whirlwind of comedic adventures featuring the genius inventor Null and her not-so-typical robot sister, Peta Robo.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
